messages.message:
there are several issues with the stripe checkout UI
1. the instabase logo has the wrong color for some reason - why is the bottom right shape green?
2. we should not say “Add any Units to Instabase AI Hub” - the user already has selected a certain number of units before getting to this page
3. I think this copy can be improved “Qty 1,000, $0.01 per unit”
    a. there are too many commas too close together, and why are we abbreviating quantity?
    b. maybe “Buying 1,000 units at $0.01 per unit” would be better?
cc @Xindi Xu
cc <!subteam^S043ATQ26AU> for suggestions on copy here
Great point! Will def update 1 & 2. I don't think 3 is customizable, but I'll double check

For best localization, we should use label-value pairs.

Units:
Cost per unit:
btw i assume the same buggy logo is used for the receipt

also, a few questions about the payment receipt
1. should the support site be https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/docs/ instead?
2. is this phone number real? i tried calling but no one picked up
ooh i got an automated voice saying “We are sorry. No one is available to take your call. Please leave a message after the tone.”
Updated the links in the email receipt. Per @alex, removed the phone number.
